short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So simple that the name is even shortened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I felt like people need a simple and clean way to have their time displayed and I have done a pretty good job doing that. This extension is mainly for people who like simplicity. The minimal and flat look is quite appealing to the eye.

Download and enjoy!
